articles.title: After contentious debate, FDA approves first Alzheimer’s drug since 2003
articles.description: On Monday, the US Food and Drug Administration granted approval to a keenly-watched Alzheimer’s drug, aducanumab, developed by the drugmaker Biogen. The decision to approve the drug, which was once abandoned as a failure, has been the subject of debate within…
